Task.Name: Project Planning
Task.Description: Define project scope, objectives, and detailed plan including timelines and resource allocation.

Task.Name: Infrastructure Setup
Task.Description: Set up development, staging, and production environments using cloud services.

Task.Name: Backend Development
Task.Description: Rewrite the backend APIs from Node.js to Rust, ensuring integration with existing MERN stack.

Task.Name: Testing and Quality Assurance
Task.Description: Perform comprehensive testing to ensure the new backend works seamlessly and meets performance benchmarks.

Task.Name: Deployment
Task.Description: Deploy the new backend to production environment and perform final checks and adjustments.

Task.Name: Monitoring and Optimization
Task.Description: Monitor the system performance and optimize as necessary to ensure stability and efficiency.

Task.Name: Project Closure
Task.Description: Final documentation, project review, and closure of the project.
